authority.cancel_connect_authority_text: You will be logged out if you don't add an author identity to your user. All authenticated users must have a connected author identity to use the application. Do you still want to cancel?
authority.connected_info: Your name is added to the author registry
authority.description_create_own_authority: There exists author identities which matches your name. You can still create a new one.
authority.description_no_authority_found: We cannot find an author identity which matches with your name (retrieved from your login account). A new author identity will be created in order for you to use this service. If the name does not match your name, you need to contact your curator at your institution in order to correct it.

dialog.heading: Connect or create ORCID iD
dialog.paragraph0: Sign in to ORCID or register to create an account.
dialog.paragraph1: ORCID provides a persistent digital identifier that you own and control, and that distinguishes you from every other researcher. Your ORCID iD can be used in many contexts. By connecting your ORCID iD it is easier to identify you as an author, and to retrieve and share your publications.

orcid.orcid_description: To connect your ORCID iD, sign into ORCID. Or register to create your ORCID iD and connect. It makes it easier to identify you.
orcid.remove_connection_info:
Are you sure you want to remove the connection to ORCID? 

If you want to revoke Unit's access to read your ORCID, you have to go to your profile.
